Name: market for process-specific burdens, hazardous waste incineration plant | process-specific burdens, hazardous waste incineration plant | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15327/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'process-specific burdens, hazardous waste incineration plant', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'process-specific burdens, hazardous waste incineration plant',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  process-specific burdens, hazardous waste incineration plant', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
